document_data.name: Lothan Maergh
document_data.refs2e: {{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|10}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 8: To Venerate The Great Mother}}
document_data.mainbody:
'''Lothan Maergh''' was a [[cleric]] of [[Chauntea]] with the rank of Watchful that resided in the [[Bounty of the Goddess (Voonlar)|Bounty of the Goddess]] temple in [[Voonlar]].
__NOTOC__
document_data.Abilities: Watchful Brother Lothan was a horticulturist that specialized in the production and storage of bulbs and seeds as well as grafting techniques.
